'''''Brothers and Friends: The Diaries of Major Warren Hamilton Lewis''''' presents a selection of [[Warren Lewis]]'s diaries, edited by [[Clyde S. Kilby]] and Marjorie Lamp Mead.

Several of the entries mention recollections of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (see for example page 195).<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 309</ref>
